Detailed Description

Hard-coded reaction mechanism used for testing.

The species are assumed to have the following order:

e- N O NO NO+ N2 O2

The reactions are:

1) N2 + M = 2N + M kf = A1*sqrt(Th*Tv), kb = A1*Th/keq(Th) 2) O2 + N = 2O + N kf = A2*sqrt(Th*Tv), kb = A2*Th/keq(Th) 3) O2 + e- = 2O + e- kf = A3*Tv, kb = A3*Tv/keq(Tv) 4) O2 + N = NO + O kf = A4*Th, kb = A4*Th/keq(Th) 5) N + O = NO+ + e- kf = A5*Th, kb = A5*Tv/keq(Tv)
